Package ohos.ai.tts

Interface TtsListener


  • public interface TtsListener
    Provides callbacks for managing the status of text-to-speech (TTS) interface calls.
    Since:
    3

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void onError​(String utteranceId, String errorMessage)
      Called when an error occurs during audio synthesis or speaking.
      void onEvent​(int eventType, PacMap pacMap)
      Called when a TTS event occurs.
      void onFinish​(String utteranceId)
      Called when audio synthesis is finished.
      void onProgress​(String utteranceId, byte[] audioData, int progress)
      Called when the audio synthesis progress changes.
      void onSpeechFinish​(String utteranceId)
      Called when audio speaking is finished.
      void onSpeechProgressChanged​(String utteranceId, int progress)
      Called when the audio speaking progress changes.
      void onSpeechStart​(String utteranceId)
      Called when audio speaking starts.
      void onStart​(String utteranceId)
      Called when audio synthesis starts.

    • Method Detail

      • onStart

        void onStart​(String utteranceId)
        Called when audio synthesis starts.
        Parameters:
        utteranceId - Uniquely identifies the TTS request.
        Since:
        3

      • onProgress

        void onProgress​(String utteranceId,
                byte[] audioData,
                int progress)
        Called when the audio synthesis progress changes.

        The progress indicator is incremented by 1 each time an audio frame is synthesized.

        Parameters:
        utteranceId - Uniquely identifies the TTS request.
        audioData - Indicates the audio byte stream.
        progress - Indicates the audio synthesis progress.
        Since:
        3

      • onFinish

        void onFinish​(String utteranceId)
        Called when audio synthesis is finished.
        Parameters:
        utteranceId - Uniquely identifies the TTS request.
        Since:
        3

      • onError

        void onError​(String utteranceId,
             String errorMessage)
        Called when an error occurs during audio synthesis or speaking.
        Parameters:
        utteranceId - Uniquely identifies the TTS request.
        errorMessage - Indicates the error message, for example, the speaking fails due to no initialization or the text is empty.
        Since:
        3

      • onEvent

        void onEvent​(int eventType,
             PacMap pacMap)
        Called when a TTS event occurs.
        Parameters:
        eventType - Indicates the event type. Available event types are defined in TtsEvent.
        pacMap - Indicates a parcel map containing the method ID.
        Since:
        3

      • onSpeechStart

        void onSpeechStart​(String utteranceId)
        Called when audio speaking starts.
        Parameters:
        utteranceId - Uniquely identifies the TTS request.
        Since:
        3

      • onSpeechProgressChanged

        void onSpeechProgressChanged​(String utteranceId,
                             int progress)
        Called when the audio speaking progress changes.
        Parameters:
        utteranceId - Uniquely identifies the TTS request.
        progress - Indicates the audio speaking progress.
        Since:
        3

      • onSpeechFinish

        void onSpeechFinish​(String utteranceId)
        Called when audio speaking is finished.
        Parameters:
        utteranceId - Uniquely identifies the TTS request.
        Since:
        3
